mission: Family Guy style animated news. Iran International logo. News anchor Maryam (big eyes, hijab, exaggerated Persian features like Lois Griffin) reports: 'Breaking news: Scientists confirm water has officially ghosted Iran. It left no forwarding address.' Show cartoon map of Iran with water droplets running away with suitcases. Cut to Peter Griffin-style government official drinking tea: 'Water? Never heard of her.' Dark humor: Citizens licking morning dew off cars. Persian subtitle: 'آب رفت پی کارش' (Water went its own way)

script_processing.original_script: Welcome back to Iran International News. I am your anchor, Maryam. We have breaking news: Scientists have confirmed water has officially ghosted Iran. It left no forwarding address, truly vanishing without a trace. (Visual: Cartoon map of Iran, water droplets with suitcases running away.) We go now to a government official. Sir, what do you say about the water crisis? Water? Never heard of her. Is she single? (Visual: Government official drinking tea nonchalantly.) Meanwhile, citizens are seen licking morning dew off cars. (Persian Subtitle: آب رفت پی کارش) Truly a resourceful nation facing… unexpected departures.
script_processing.final_script: Welcome back to Iran International News. I am your anchor, Maryam. We have breaking news: Scientists confirm water has vanished from Iran.  It is a complete disappearance. We now go to a government official for comment. Sir, what is your response to this water crisis?  Water?  I have not heard of her. Is she single? Meanwhile, desperate citizens are seen collecting morning dew from car surfaces.  A truly resourceful, yet heartbreaking, situation unfolds as this unexpected crisis deepens. The lack of water impacts agriculture, daily life, and threatens public health.  Experts warn of a severe humanitarian crisis unless immediate action is taken. International aid organizations are preparing emergency relief packages.  The government is under immense pressure to provide solutions.  Citizens are organizing protests, demanding answers and action. The situation is dire, and the future remains uncertain.  The government's nonchalant response is adding to public outrage.  We will continue to provide updates as this critical situation evolves.  Please stay tuned for further developments.
